content: I'm on the text team and had a message in one of my batches from someone who's already volunteering but has hit a roadblock with verifying her phone # for Discord. From the little that I know, it sounds like it's because it's attributed to an existing Discord account and she's not sure how to solve the issue in order to get involved. One of the Text Mods is trying to get an answer for me but noted we may not hear back. I'd hate to leave this person hanging, because they appear to be genuinely motivated to volunteer with us - thought I'd post here on her behalf for good measure. Can anyone help with this? Is there a general tech support email perhaps I can direct her to or....?  I have the Spoke convo info up for the time being, if that's helpful!
<@568257600228032512> when you're next online can you help with this?
Hi <@1279574690041430170> do you have the volunteer's Discord username?
No, she didn't share that with me - but I do have her full name and the additional conversation data info from Spoke!
I can DM it all to you if that's helpful? I'll provide the little I have
<@1279574690041430170> I sent you a friend request.
